title: Hidden Plinko Interpretation: A Deterministic Substrate Model for Emergent Quantum Statistics
description: This repository contains the data, code, and formal paper for the Hidden Plinko Interpretation (HPI), a deterministic computational framework for modeling quantum-like statistical behavior. It includes reproducible simulations, parameter sweeps, entropy analyses, and analog experiments such as ER=EPR, entropic gravity, and the holographic principle.
